title: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff says he might rename the company 'Agentforce'
description: The SaaS pioneer recently learned in focus groups that customers want to talk about AI agents now
content:
Salesforce
 CEO Marc Benioff
 is done talking about the cloud and is renaming everything after its AI software Agentforce perhaps even the whole company.
Salesforce slapped the "Agentforce" monike… [+2311 chars]
